traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The conjurer is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The conjurer has the following wizard spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): acid splash, mage hand, poison spray, prestidigitation * 1st level (4 slots): mage armor, magic missile, unseen servant\* * 2nd level (3 slots): cloud of daggers\*, misty step\*, web\* * 3rd level (3 slots): fireball, stinking cloud\* * 4th level (3 slots): Evard's black tentacles\*, stoneskin * 5th level (2 slots): cloudkill\*, conjure elemental\* *Conjuration spell of 1st level or higher

traits.name: Benign Transportation (Recharges after the Conjurer Casts a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher)
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the conjurer teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see. If it instead chooses a space within range that is occupied by a willing Small or Medium creature, they both teleport, swapping places.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage.
